content: Once you defeat this stronger Wolf Assassin, you’ll find that he will leave behind a Blue Spirit you can absorb for a new Spirit Attack! He also guards a chest you can loot to earn a **Blood of the Iron Bull** material upgrade, and 3 **Stone Spirit**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Cave'.
The content is as follows:
Once you defeat this stronger Wolf Assassin, you’ll find that he will leave behind a Blue Spirit you can absorb for a new Spirit Attack! He also guards a chest you can loot to earn a **Blood of the Iron Bull** material upgrade, and 3 **Stone Spirit**.
